long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This browser extension changes your existing new tab page to our homepage with a built in game of Pong. It will feature: A responsive and dynamic game of Pong, single player or co-op with plenty of fun extras added.

This tab also includes satisfying links to popular websites for when you are finished. A convenient web search powered by Bing.com search results, so you can easily search for your favourite topics, images, videos, and news

By clicking PongPortal, I accept and agree to installing PongPortal Extension and setting the New tab to https://www.bing.com is that provided by Microsoft Bing, Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
